adfs-claim.help: Enable/disable ADFS Claim for user/group attribute in assertion statement (default = disable).
adfs-claim.name: adfs-claim

options.help: Enable ADFS Claim for user/group attribute in assertion statement.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable ADFS Claim for user/group attribute in assertion statement.
options.name: disable

options.help: Digest Method Algorithm is SHA1.
options.name: sha1

options.help: Digest Method Algorithm is SHA256.
options.name: sha256

options.help: E-mail address of the user.
options.name: email

options.help: Given name of the user.
options.name: given-name

options.help: Unique name of the user.
options.name: name

options.help: User principal name (UPN) of the user.
options.name: upn

options.help: Common name of the user.
options.name: common-name

options.help: E-mail address of the user when interoperating with AD FS 1.1 or ADFS 1.0.
options.name: email-adfs-1x

options.help: Group that the user is a member of.
options.name: group

options.help: User principal name (UPN) of the user.
options.name: upn-adfs-1x

options.help: Role that the user has.
options.name: role

options.help: Surname of the user
options.name: sur-name

options.help: Private identifier of the user.
options.name: ppid

options.help: SAML name identifier of the user.
options.name: name-identifier

options.help: Method used to authenticate the user.
options.name: authentication-method

options.help: Deny-only group SID of the user.
options.name: deny-only-group-sid

options.help: Deny-only primary SID of the user.
options.name: deny-only-primary-sid

options.help: Deny-only primary group SID of the user.
options.name: deny-only-primary-group-sid

options.help: Group SID of the user.
options.name: group-sid

options.help: Primary group SID of the user.
options.name: primary-group-sid

options.help: Primary SID of the user.
options.name: primary-sid

options.help: Domain account name of the user in the form of <domain>\<user>.
options.name: windows-account-name

limit-relaystate.help: Enable/disable limiting of relay-state parameter when it exceeds SAML 2.0 specification limits (80 bytes).
limit-relaystate.name: limit-relaystate

options.help: Enable limiting of relay-state parameter when it exceeds SAML 2.0 specification limits (80 bytes).
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable limiting of relay-state parameter when it exceeds SAML 2.0 specification limits (80 bytes).
options.name: disable
